name: Slice Fruit Slash Sword Best Ninja-Samurai game HD
name_original: Slice Fruit Slash Sword Best Ninja-Samurai game HD
description:
The Slice Fruit Slash Sword - best Ninja Samurai cutting game is an excellent way to while away 5 minutes while playing it on your phone or tablet.
It requires you to slice fruits using super swords and powerful magic while keeping an eye out for bombs.
Choose your swords and get a real fruit carnage going!
